summary: Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years of experience architecting, developing, and maintaining high-performance web and mobile applications. Proven expertise in leading complex projects, driving innovation, and delivering scalable solutions across diverse industries with a strong focus on optimizing system architecture and long-term sustainability.

highlights: Led design, development, and deployment of custom software solutions using React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript
Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and define project scope
Built responsive web and cross-platform mobile applications using React and React Native
Managed project timelines and deliverables while maintaining strong client relationships
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to promote best practices
Developed web applications with React, increasing user engagement by 20%
Built cross-platform mobile apps using React Native for iOS and Android
Improved application performance by 35% through state management and code-splitting
Collaborated with UX/UI designers and backend teams in an Agile environment
Led code reviews and mentored junior engineers
Developed scalable IoT solutions using Java, Spring Boot, and AWS
Built and optimized RESTful APIs with Java and Node.js
Designed interactive dashboards using React and JavaScript
Deployed applications using Docker and Kubernetes achieving 99.9% uptime
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to reduce deployment errors by 20%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
